Translations.Text: Ass ideg ara d ias, yal yiwen, ad inamer $ef yiman is, u yal yiwen ad iiiukafi $ef wayen ixdem, nitni ur pwadensen
Ifka d Oebbi amedya n temdint, i illan di laman u iimana. Ippas ip id ooeeq is, s lufa, si yal tama. Tenkeo l$it n Oebbi. Isukk Oebbi fellas tawa$it n llae akked lweec, ilmend n wayen la uuenaan
Ni$ iusa ten id umazan, segsen. Skaddben t, iwwet iten uaaqeb, nitni densen
Eccet seg wayen is ikwen I$at Oebbi, i ieellen, i imaanen. Snemmret l$it n Oebbi, ma d Neppa ay taabdem
I yawen Igdel siwa loifa, idim, aksum n yilef, akked wayen id irsen s yisem ur nelli d win n Oebbi. Ma d win terra tmara, ur ijuo, ur inufeq, Oebbi, s tidep, Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Ur qqaoet tikerkas id ppawin ilsawen nnwen: "aya d leelal, aya d leeoam". A d tegrem tikerkas $ef Oebbi. Wid id iggaren tikerkas $ef Oebbi, ur rebeen
Drus ara zhun, fellasen aaaqeb aqeoean
I wudayen, Negdel ayen i$ef i k Neeka, iu$ leal. Ur ten Nednis, maca nitni ddennisen iman nnsen
Sinna, Mass ik, i wid ixedmen cceoo, ur ssinen, d$a steooaen deffir waya, u sweqmen, Mass ik, war ccekk, deffir waya, Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Iboahim, ih, d amdan i imalen ar tidep, i iunzen i Oebbi. Ur illi seg imcurak
Isnemmar l$it iS. Ifren it u Inha t s abrid uwqim
Nefka yas di ddunit ise$, u, di laxeot, neppa, s tidep, ad yili seg izedganen
Sinna, Nweeea yak d a ppedduv d ddin n Iboahim, i imalen ar tidep. Ur illi seg imcurak
Ssebt, iu$al kan i wid imgarraden fellas. Ih, Mass ik ad Ieudd garasen, ass n tnekra, $ef wayen llan mgarraden
Enced s abrid n Mass ik, s uuwab akked nnhaya tumaint. Mmeslay iten, s yiles aeidan mavi. Ih, Mass ik Yif akw akken Issen, anwi i iff$en seg ubrid iS. Neppa Yif akw akken Issen, anwi i ipwanhan
Ma taaqbem, aaqbet akken teppuaaqbem. Ma tueboem, yif it i iueboiyen
Eubeo. Uuebo ik s Oebbi kan. Ur $webben ilmend nnsen, ur pveyyiq si tcengal nnsen
Ih, Oebbi Atan ar wid ipeezziben, akked wid issewqamen
